document: ON THE FOURIER SERIES OF THE SQUARE OF A FUNCTION by STEPHEN HARRY CRANDALL M.E., Stevens Institute of Technology 1942 SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY at the MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY Signature of Author Department of Mathematics, Feb. 4, 1946. Certified by Thesis Supervisor Chairman, Dept. Comm. on Graduate Students
